pageContext.title: Women's Studies Database
pageContext.description_excerpt: The University of Maryland Women's Studies Database, begun in September 1992 and continued/developed later at MITH, serves those people interested in the women's studies profession and in general women's issues. Designed in collaboration with researchers, program administrators and information specialists in women's studies,  the database contains links to bibliographies, announcements, conferences and calls for papers, and other references relevant to the discipline.\r\n\r\n
